Question
========

In a random sample of n = 16 economics students, one finds 8 girls. The 95% confidence interval for the proportion of female economics students then includes the values

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20 and 0.60
* 0.35 and 0.70
* 0.35 and 0.80

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20 and 0.60: Incorrect
* 0.35 and 0.70: Correct
* 0.35 and 0.80: Incorrect
